reviews.text: Great food and friendly service, we love the steak nachos here! Everything else we have tried has been delicious as well. So happy they are in the area.

Exelente lugar para comer limpio buen servicio muchas opciones para elegir la comida fresca y con un buen saz√≥n yo ped√≠ un burrito con arroz reci√©n echo y lo que m√°s me gust√≥ que la carne que sea que pidas se cosina al instante recomendable
Excellent food. Great atmosphere. Friendly service!
I searched for a Mexican spot nearby and Xolo had the best ratings ‚Äî now I see why! The Crunchy Burrito Bowl was absolutely delicious. Highly recommend!
Food/Drinks is amazing n most definitely a must try. most definitely be back
We needed a place like this in the neighborhood. I love their ground beef hard shell tacos... so yummy... everything is so fresh and tasty.
Authentic and delicious every time. üòã
The food here is amazing, the workers are very friendly, and the place is extremely clean and organized
delicious quesadilla and chips and salsa
The shrimp taco and the steak taco is always top tier. Amazing! 10/10 highly recommend.
Straight forward mexican food. Made fast, nothing over the top. They also serve breakfast food here too.
Excelente Servicio, y Mucho Mejor la Calidad de la Comida, Es Muy Buena y Con Los Ingredientes Siempre Frescos.  100%  Se Los Recomiendo
I love it here! Not only is their food delicious, the staff is amazing and kind.
I was so impressed with this hidden gem! Authentic Mexican cuisine and our waitress Bea was spectacular!  The tuna was so fresh and the carne asada melted in your mouth! I will be going back to Xolo
I love it, fulfills every craving I have.
The food is great!

I never ran so fast to leave a review!!!
I just got my food delivered and when I tried the chilaquiles it took me back to my trip to CDM!!!! To the chef‚Ä¶ thank you so much for an amazing breakfast!!!!! Delicious
The food is amazing very fresh, the people are very nice and kind and perfect for any occasionü§©ü§©ü§©üòãüòãüòã
Wow. Best AL PASTOR Tacos i‚Äôve had in a while. Please try with pineapple as its meant to be. So flavorful, fresh ingredients! Friendly staff!
Delicious!!
I got the burrito bowl and it was so delicious! The atmosphere and staff are very nice and friendly. Service was quick and easy! Definitely recommend this place!

Las quesabirrias son muy deliciosas
Los duenos y personal muy amables
Me gusto mucho el ambiente
Definitivamente lo recomiendo

Love this spot, all those who go will love this place too! Real Mexican food!!! great Vibes. I will always come back to OXOL Mexican Grill! This needs to be in every neighborhood! Shoutout to the whole team that‚Äôs works there ‚úäüèæüñ§‚ù§Ô∏è

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
This place is a hidden gem in Mott Haven! If you‚Äôre looking for authentic Mexican food in a peaceful and welcoming atmosphere, this is the spot. The tacos, soups, and quesadillas are absolutely delicious‚Äîpacked with flavor and made with fresh ingredients.

Beyond the amazing food, the customer service is top-notch. The staff is always warm, friendly, and attentive, making you feel right at home. Whether you‚Äôre stopping by for a quick bite or a relaxing meal, the energy here is always joyful.

Highly recommend this place to anyone craving real, flavorful Mexican cuisine! Can‚Äôt wait to come back.

Great food and great customer service
A wonderful experience
Las quesadillas de Birria muy ricas, se las recomiendo! La cajera muy amable y muy buen servicio! üôÇ‚Ä¶
Muy bueno en todo los sentidos de verdad te prestan atenci√≥n te ayuda inmediatamente entras excelente

So delicious! We got several different kinds of tacos and the meat was marinated so well. Will definitely be returning soon.
The tres leches cake was also 10/10

Brand new restaurant in the area, I was blown away by their many options! So far I‚Äôve tried their burrito bowl which was amazing, great portions, ingredients, and taste. Tonight I had the sopes and elote and let me tell you they taste like homemade sopes. Definitely recommend, the food is great and the service is just as amazing.
Thanks to the lord
I've ordered from this place three times. Their nachos are fireeeee.

This is a great addition to the neighborhood!  They have a great menu including a lot of breakfast options and all the things you want from a local Mexican joint at really great prices!  Fresh, quality food, fast service and the staff were great.  I had floutas, tacos, and churros and all were better than expected.  Looking forward to trying a bunch of other things (like carne asada fries!) *edit - carne asada fries were not so great

Nice experience, atmosphere and a wonderful service
And those Quesabirrias were delicious
I would definitely come back again üòÅ
Xolo is such an amazing restaurant. I ordered French toast and my daughter had pancakes with fresh fruit. Both meals were delicious!
Amazing food, service, and helpful employees. We had four different tacos; each was delicious and unique. Will be back.

Had shrimp taco and chicken soup, both are really tasty. Shrimp taco is topped with good amount of lettuce and tomato, perfect with their sauce. And the chick soup is really comforting. Great choice when it‚Äôs cold outside! Recommend!
Fresh Mexican bread everything here super fresh

I got the carne asada burrito, elote, and Jamaica.

all very delicious!

Quesabirria! It was delicious! All the ingredients were tasty and fresh individually, amazing combined. The staff made me feel welcomed and greeted me with a smile the entire time. The consome for the birria was so flavorful. Definitely recommend, especially the birria!

Terrible experience. The food was almost impossible to eat. The meat was so tough and chewy that it felt like they didn‚Äôt care about quality at all. Every bite was a struggle, and it was honestly disappointing. Not worth the time or money.
What a great edition to the area! Fresh ingredients, delicious food, sweet staff, and an overall good atmosphere! Would definitely recommend, especially the tostadas!‚ù§Ô∏è
